item.content:encoded:
Price: $79.18
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:51:55 UTC – Details)


Perfect as a chic stand-alone piece or for layering, this gold-tone Michael Kors jewelry necklace features a brilliant-cut crystal in a thick, MK logo-engraved bezel pendant setting. The lobster_b_claw clasp is accented with a drop pendant with the MK logo and an additional crystal.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6.34 x 5.55 x 0.35 inches; 0.21 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ MKJ5340710
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 8, 2016
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Michael Kors Jewelry
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B017L7XMXG

Perfect as a chic stand-alone piece or for layering, this gold-tone Michael Kors Jewelry necklace features a brilliant-cut crystal in a thick, MK logo-engraved bezel pendant setting
The lobster claw clasp is accented with a drop pendant with the MK logo and an additional crystal
Michael Kors women’s jewelry are designed for everyday life. Synonymous with timelessness and a jet set lifestyle

MICHAEL KORS

The Michael Kors jewelry collection is crafted from sterling silver, semi-precious stones and sparkling accents, creating uniquely personal jewelry designed to go beyond fashion.

item.title: Timex T2N092 Easy Reader 35mm Gold-Tone Extra-Long Stainless Steel Expansion Band Watch
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) The direct descendant of our 1960s televised torture test survivors, today’s Easy Reader is as durable as it is classically cool. Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7.2 x 1.38 x 0.39 inches; 2.08 Ounces Item model number ‏ : ‎ T2N092 Batteries ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $59.00 - $41.30
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:26 UTC – Details)


The direct descendant of our 1960s televised torture test survivors, today’s Easy Reader is as durable as it is classically cool.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7.2 x 1.38 x 0.39 inches; 2.08 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ T2N092
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 19, 2011
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Timex
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B004X3ZE9W
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Philippines
Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

White dial with day & date window at 3 o’clock; full Arabic numerals
Gold-tone 35mm brass case with mineral glass crystal
Indiglo light-up watch dial
Water resistant to 30m (100ft): in general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming or bathing

Timeless Design

For 40 years and counting, the Timex Easy Reader has been a fan favorite. The iconic simplicity of the collection is exactly what a watch should be: a well-crafted and sensible timepiece.

Read more

Timex Easy Reader

Easy-to-Read Dial

True to its name, easy-to-read numbers are balanced with the clean dial design.

Attention to Detail & Quality

When it comes to a well-made watch, every detail matters. The all-metal case and mineral glass lens offer strength and durability.

Indiglo

Our revolutionary Indiglo back-light technology changed how the world told time in the dark.

Read more

Strap Options

Our watch straps, bands and bracelets are designed for ease of use, simple adjustability and total comfort. With our Fast Wrap and quick-release options, you get tool-free interchangeability and a great fit on any wrist.

Read more

Read more

4.5
Price: $59.00 - $41.30
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:26 UTC – Details)
